resources.string: Here you can write a brief description

This is the "Shade store Inventory app".

With this app you can mantain a list of all of your sunglasses, goggles etc. in the same place.

You can add new ones, set descriptions, color and manufacturer name.
You can tap the following button to navigate to the instructions screen
Button to navigate to instruction fragment

In the main screen you will see the list of all the shades/glasses/goggles you own.

You an scroll the list and look for the item you want to see.

You can press de + button to add a new item to the list.
Tap the following button to go to the list.
